name: Free Fall -Ninja Escape
description:
Help the little ninja to escape from dangerous jungle.
Free Fall is a fast-paced vertical falling game. Keep falling on series of never-ending bamboo walls. These aren't any ordinary walls as they contain all sorts of hazards and enemies.
.
This game features stunning graphics, rich gameplay and action that add to the game’s appeal. In this fast paced ninja falling game, your goal is to fall as longer as you can to score more and more. With a simple tap you can jump from one wall to the other and avoid obstacles otherwise the game is over for you.
